XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Totara OAuth2 server

TABLE.NAME: totara_oauth2_client_provider
TABLE.COMMENT: A table to store the client's id and secret that we are providing to other parties

FIELD.NAME: id_number
FIELD.COMMENT: A unique identifier which is used for identify the record.

FIELD.NAME: scope
FIELD.COMMENT: List of scopes supported by the client. A string that contains list of scope, separated by a space.

FIELD.NAME: grant_types
FIELD.COMMENT: List of grant types supported by the client. An array imploded by a space.

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: Which component is this client provider is being used for.

TABLE.NAME: totara_oauth2_access_token
TABLE.COMMENT: A Table to store the list of access tokens that had been generated for OAuth2 clients.

FIELD.NAME: identifier
FIELD.COMMENT: A generated identifier token for OAuth2 clients. Please be aware that this identifier is not the access token that we provide to external parties, it is a unique hash that is a part of access token.

FIELD.NAME: expires
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp when this very token expires.

FIELD.NAME: scope
FIELD.COMMENT: A string that contains list of scopes, separated by a space.
